text: وَثَمُودُ وَقَوۡمُ لُوطٖ وَأَصۡحَٰبُ لۡـَٔيۡكَةِۚ أُوْلَـٰٓئِكَ ٱلۡأَحۡزَابُ

translation.en: And [the tribe of] Thamud and the people of Lot and the companions of the thicket. Those are the companies
translation.id: dan (begitu juga) Samud, kaum Luṭ dan penduduk Aikah.748) Mereka itulah golongan-golongan yang bersekutu (menentang rasul-rasul)
